p.b: Register a tag for the article
Control the behavior of the table of content

tr.td:
visible : True/False to display or not the table of content (true by default)
Example : <pragma:toc visible="false" />

value : The language ID
Example : <pragma:lang value="fr" />
ISO 639 2 letter language codes

p.b: Append the directory listing of a given location

tr.td:
src : Location (default: the current folder)
Example : <pragma:directoryindex src="." />

p.b: Set the article's weight for the search engine

tr.td:
value : Decimal value between 0.0 and 10.0
Example : <pragma:weight value="0.8" />
